title: France panorama. [No. 72/45]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. European summit - meeting of the Common Market countries in Paris. 2. In the news: European championships - finals of the Formula-3 European automobile championships; World championships in Monaco. 3. Exotarium - exotic fish at Vincennes. 4. Among the immortals - the Duke of Castries, newest member of the french Academy. 5. Takis - magnetism and light.
